_header: I hung on the cross for love of thee
Note: For very similar lines see 3387, 4275, 6032, 6135, and last stanza of 6713. In the same form as here, they were incorporated in 1913 and 6650.
_description: ‘In cruce sum pro te’ (4 lines), a tag in the Fasciculus morum, translating ‘In cruce sum pro te qui peccas desine pro me / Desine do veniam dic culpam retraho penam’ which precedes them

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
I hong one cros for loue of þeleue þi synne for loue of
                    meMercy aske amende þe sone& y for ȝyf þat ys mis
                    done
BodLauMis213.Note:
Written as prose, trans. In cruce sum pro te…, which
                    precedes it.

Bod410.Transcription:
I honge on cros for loue of þeLeue þi synne for loue of
                    meMercy ask amend þe soneAnd I forȝif þat is
                    mysdone

BodRawC670.Transcription:
I honge on cros for loue of theLef þy synne for loue of
                    meMercy aske amende þe soneAnd I forȝyf þe þat is
                    mysdone

CamGon364.Transcription:
I hange on cros for loue of þeleue þi synne for loue of
                    meMerci þou aske a mende þe soneAnd for ȝeue þat
                    is mys dome

CamStJohn159.Transcription:
I hange on crose for lust luf of þelef þi syn
                    for luf of meMercy ask amend þe soneAnd I for gyf þe
                    þat ys mysdone

Lincoln44.Transcription:
I hong on croys for loue of þeleue þy synne for loue of
                    meMercy aske amende the soneAnd I for þ ȝefe
                    þat is mysdone

WorcQ3.Transcription:
I hong on þe crosse for loue of þeleue þe syn for loue
                    of meMercy ask amend þe soneAnd I for gyf þat is mys
                    done

WorcF19.Transcription:
I honge on þe cros fo þe loue oft of theMan aske
                    amende amende þe sone & y for geue þe þat ys
                    misdon

Spalding.Transcription:
I hyng on þe cros for luffe of theleue thi syn for lufe of
                    meMercy aske amend þe sone& I forgyf þat is
                    mysdone
